title: Texas Instruments TI-Nspire CX II CAS Color Graphing Calculator with Student Software (PC/Mac)
description: Texas Instruments TI-Nspire CX II CAS Color Graphing Calculator Faster performance, added interactive visuals and easier-to-read graphics expand the TI-Nspire CX graphing calculators’. Animated path plot: Visualize function, parametric and polar graphs as they are drawn in real time. Dynamic coefficient values: Explore direct connections between dynamic coefficients in equations and graphs. Points by coordinates: Create dynamic points defined by coordinates, sliders or expressions quickly.
